sentence.Network_en: The company is on the verge of insolvency.
After declaring insolvency, he was handed quietly and without uproar to a policeman.
sentence.Network_cn: 声明自己不名一文之后, 他就被安安静静,不吵不闹地交到警察手里.

sentence.Network_en: Insolvency matters are covered under the Bankruptcy Code.
sentence.Network_cn: 资不抵债事项由《破产法典》调整.

entry.def: Insolvency is the state of not having enough money to pay your debts.

example.ex: The economy has entered a sharp downturn, and unemployment and insolvencies can be expected to increase.
example.tran: 经济形势急转直下，失业与破产现象预计将会增多。
